channel.title: IaC on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in IaC on Modernization workshop

item.title: Account and Workload Security with Lacework
item.description: Learn about securing the software delivery process, implementing security operation workflows on AWS, and managing security across accounts with Lacework Cloud Security Platform.

item.title: AWS Modernization Workshop with HashiCorp Terraform Cloud
item.description: Get hands-on experience using HashiCorp Terraform Cloud to deploy infrastructure as code in AWS and leverage Sentinel policy-as-code to enable fine-grained, logic-based policy decision. By completing this lab you will learn how to leverage HashiCorp Terraform Cloud and Sentinel for easier deployments of your applications and infrastructure in AWS.

item.title: DevSecOps with Bridgecrew
item.description: Learn about securing CloudFormation templates from code to cloud using Bridgecrew’s integrations with VS Code, CodeBuild, CodePipeline, GitHub and AWS runtime.

item.title: DevSecOps with Bridgecrew and Terraform
item.description: Learn about securing Terraform templates from code to cloud using Bridgecrew’s integrations with VS Code, GitHub, Terraform Cloud, and AWS runtime.

item.title: Securing AWS Infrastructure with Trend Micro
item.description: In this workshop, you’ll learn how to leverage infrastructure as code (IaC) and Security to automate your cloud security efforts. If you’re interested in making cloud security more efficient, automated, proactive, and accessible to developers, cloud architects, DevOps engineers this workshop is for you!

item.title: Application Modernization with CircleCI
item.description: In this workshop you will learn why DevOps is a pattern for modernization and how to use patterns with CircleCI to release features and functionality at a faster pace.

item.title: Build a modern architecture with GitLab, Hashicorp and Gremlin
item.description: In this workshop we will work with GitLab, Hashicorp and Gremlin to show how to detect single points of failure within a gitflow deployment.

item.title: Modern Infrastructure as Code with Pulumi
item.description: This workshop teaches you “Modern” Infrastructure as Code (IaC) concepts through a series of hands-on labs, using Pulumi.
